pullRequest.body:
This PR has basic identities satisfied by general binomial coefficients, together with corresponding lemmas about evaluating Pochhammer polynomials.

---

- [ ] depends on: #13428
- [ ] depends on: #13430

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9946522136/job/27477236538)

Could we replace the `succ` with `+1`?
and below.

```suggestion
theorem choose_succ_succ [NatPowAssoc R] (r : R) (k : â„•) :
```
I *think* we usually lowercase `Nat` here.
This should be `choose_smul`. (Possibly in fact `choose_smul_choose` but don't have a strong opinion.)
and below.
I wish this had a better name (I dislike primes!) but don't have a suggestion. If something comes to mind I'll trust you on it, otherwise it can stay.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat (RingTheory/Binomial) : Standard lemmas for Ring.choose
